ua.training.model

Class Necklace

  • java.lang.Object
    • ua.training.model.Necklace

  • public class Necklace
extends java.lang.Object
    Dedicated for creating new necklace with gemstones, sorting it by worth, calculating weight and filter by clarity or preciousness.
